titleStmt.title: His Majesties most gracious speech to both houses of Parliament, on Friday the 22th of May, 1685. Published by his Majesties command.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
James II, King of England, 1633-1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by the assigns of John Bill deceas'd; and by Henry Hills, and Thomas Newcomb, printers to the Kings most excellent Majesty ;
by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to his most sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Royal coat of arms on title page; initial letter.
The first speech of King James II to Parliament. Concludes with news of Argyll's landing in Scotland.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
